p: MK, JA, FH, SA, KS, and SM performed experiments, reviewed data, and planned experimental strategy. BK, MK, FS, and DF performed bioinformatic analysis. GF and IF performed and coordinated HLA typing. FB, IC, HL, and CJ collected samples and provided clinical information. JA and FH conceived the study. JA wrote the first draft. FH and MK contributed to the writing of the manuscript. All authors critically read and edited the manuscript.
